summary.overview: The CTTU transaction provides a comprehensive transaction type maintenance system that allows authorized users to create, view, update, and delete transaction type records. The system includes user authentication, role-based access control, and a menu-driven interface that guides users through administrative and operational functions.
business_functions: User Authentication - Validate user credentials against security database and determine access privileges
Role-Based Menu Access - Display appropriate menu options based on user type (admin vs regular user)
Transaction Type Search - Allow users to search for existing transaction types by code
Transaction Type Creation - Enable creation of new transaction type records with code and description
Transaction Type Update - Modify existing transaction type descriptions and details
Transaction Type Deletion - Remove transaction type records with confirmation process
Data Validation - Ensure transaction type codes are numeric and descriptions contain valid characters
Change Detection - Compare original and modified data to determine if updates are needed
User Navigation - Provide menu-driven navigation between different system functions
Session Management - Handle user sessions and redirect to appropriate screens based on access level

CTTU.program_overview: Transaction type maintenance program for creating, updating, and deleting transaction type records
Administrative menu interface providing navigation to various admin functions
User authentication and sign-on screen for validating user credentials
Main menu interface for regular users with access control enforcement

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: User security file used to authenticate user credentials by reading user ID and password information

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Table (CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE)
datasource_summary.function: Read, update, insert and delete transaction type records with fields TR_TYPE and TR_DESCRIPTION

screen_preview.name: COADM01
screen_preview.content: Tran:CA00 AWS Mainframe Modernization Date:mm/dd/yy Prog:COADM01C CardDemo Time:hh:mm:ss Admin Menu 1. User List (Security) 2. User Add (Security) 3. User Update (Security) 4. User Delete (Security) 5. Transaction Type List/Update (Db2) 6. Transaction Type Maintenance (Db2) Please select an option : ENTER=Continue F3=Exit

screen_preview.name: COMEN01
screen_preview.content: Tran:CM00 AWS Mainframe Modernization Date:mm/dd/yy Prog:COMEN01C CardDemo Time:hh:mm:ss Main Menu 1. Account View 2. Account Update 3. Credit Card List 4. Credit Card View 5. Credit Card Update 6. Transaction List 7. Transaction View 8. Transaction Add 9. Transaction Reports 10. Bill Payment 11. Pending Authorization View Please select an option : ENTER=Continue F3=Exit

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    COTRTUPC["Transaction type maintenance program for creating, updating, and deleting transaction type records (COTRTUPC) "]
    COADM01C["Administrative menu interface providing navigation to various admin functions (COADM01C) "]
    COSGN00C["User authentication and sign-on screen for validating user credentials (COSGN00C) "]
    COMEN01C["Main menu interface for regular users with access control enforcement (COMEN01C) "]
    COTRTUPC --> COADM01C
    COADM01C --> COSGN00C
    COSGN00C --> COADM01C
    COSGN00C --> COMEN01C
    COMEN01C --> COSGN00C
